channel.title: Thoughts on Josef Spjut
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Josef Spjut

item.title: Some Thoughts
item.description: This weekend I got a chance to spend some time thinking about life and a variety of concerns. My church has a General Conference every 6 months and this last weekend was one such conference. During these conferences the church leaders share their thoughts and give direction and guidance to help people to live better lives where they can contribute more to the church and society at large. As the weekend went on, I shared a couple of quotes from the procedings that stood out to me on my twitter account.
